## ChatHeadless.getNextMessage() method

Performs a Chat API request for the next message generated by chat bot using the conversation state (e.g. message history and notes). Update the state with the response data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNextMessage(text?: string, source?: MessageSource): Promise<MessageResponse | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | _(Optional)_ the text of the next message |
|  source | MessageSource | _(Optional)_ the source of the message |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;MessageResponse \| undefined&gt;

a Promise of a response from the Chat API

## Remarks

If rejected, an Error is returned.
